summary: A FAULTY GASKET CAUSED COOLANT TO LEAK AND AS A RESULT THE COOLANT COULD BE SMELLED INSIDE OF THE VEHICLE.  WHEN THE HEATER IS TURNED ON THERE IS A LOUD NOISE.  THE DEALER REPLACED THE  BLOWER MOTOR.  THE DEALER WILL NOT REPAIR THE HEATER CORE WHICH WAS RECALLED UNDER 94V-006 BECAUSE THE VEHICLE IS TOO OLD WITH TOO MANY MILES.     *NLM
